name: The Thick
description:
The Thick

This fusion between a minesweeper and a top-down shooter game with added "fog of war" places the player into a dream world containing the fears and horrors within the antagonists imagination.

Fight your way through 3 challenging levels gaining power-ups along the way to assist you in your journey.

Can you make your way through "The Thick"? Only time will tell!

Programmers: Ahmed Azhar, Lachlan Simpson Artist: Michael W
